entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 March 2023
